subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After Saturday's brawl, the Knicks' Nate Robinson was as verbally obstinate as he had been physically brash. By Tuesday, having begun a 10-game suspension, he vowed to work toward “becoming a better person.”
snippet: After Saturday's brawl, the Knicks' Nate Robinson was as verbally obstinate as he had been physically brash. By Tuesday, having begun a 10-game suspension, he vowed to work toward “becoming a better person.”
